file_content.text: Thanks to your troubles, Gonthor Industries will reopen... just as soon as those Justicars cool off.
You sure had the deed locked up tight. Here it is.
Fantastic! Now I get a lawyer, embarrass the Senate if I have to, and Gonthor Industries will be back up in no time.
Once business kicks in, I'll do everything I can to help the Republic clean this place up.
The deed's locked up. If you're looking for an access code to reach it, check that security card I gave ya.
A Jedi. Thank the Force. Hope I can convince you to help an old man out.
Hello, Lieutenant. No one enforces justice like the Republic's finest, am I right? 'Course I am.
You look strong, armed for a fight. Maybe I can interest you in restoring some law and order down here.
Name's Luran Gonthor, president of Gonthor Industries. Finest custom metalwork on Coruscant.
Least we used to be before the Sacking. Once the attack began, I went off the grid, lost my connection to the upper levels.
Took elbow grease to stay afloat. Did well until those Justicars arrived. They took over my shop and kicked me into the street!
The Justicars will corrupt this whole area if someone doesn't stop them.
Order must be restored.
I knew you'd understand, Master Jedi.
Justicars give the Republic a bad name.
They're brutes.
Maybe you can show 'em how a real patriot fights.
Give any idiot a blaster, they're bound to cause some trouble.
Justicars are bad news.
Idiots, you got that right. Maybe you could help sort 'em out.
I'm sorry you had to endure their bullying.
That's terrible.
I'll survive. My company's another story, but it's salvageable.
You think Justicars concern me?
The Senate and such won't help; they don't want to face the Justicars. Also, they say they've got no record that it's my shop.
Of course those records are long gone, blown away during the Sacking of Coruscant.
Only proof I have now is the deed--and that's inside my old shop. If you get it, I can force the Senate to push the Justicars out.
Your company will be back on its feet in no time.
I'll get your deed.
Glad to hear it! You'll always have a friend in Gonthor Industries!
What's the deed worth to you?
I'm worth more than a few credits. Help me, and I help you.
Here's my personal security card. It's got an access code that will get you inside my vault. Once you're in, grab the deed and run.
You do it. [Refuse quest]
They said I show my face near Gonthor Industries, I get disappeared. No way I'm going back--it's over.
Nobody kicks me out of my place of business and gets away with it.
